trans-unit.source: Specifies a name for application settings property group.
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序设置属性组的名称。

trans-unit.source: A application settings class, derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>, defines one or more properties that belong to the same application settings property group.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序设置类，派生自<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>，定义一个或多个属于相同的应用程序设置属性组的属性。</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: By default, the group is assigned the name of the settings class.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，组被分配设置类的名称。

trans-unit.source: However, SettingsGroupNameAttribute can be used to explicitly specify a name for the property group.
trans-unit.target: 但是，SettingsGroupNameAttribute 可用来显式指定属性组的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name can be helpful in organizing large sets of properties, for assistance in design-time programming tools and run-time administrative tools, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此名称可以在组织大量属性，以获取帮助设计时间编程的工具和运行时管理工具中非常有用，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: The associated settings provider may even use this name to organize settings in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 关联的设置提供程序甚至可能使用此名称来组织数据存储区中的设置。

trans-unit.source: The SettingsGroupNameAttribute can only be applied at the class level.
trans-unit.target: SettingsGroupNameAttribute 只能在类级别应用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute"></xref> class.

Although the theoretical maximum length of the `groupName` parameter is constrained by the upper bounds of an <xref:System.Int32>, practical limits, determined by usability and quota limitations imposed by the settings provider, will be much smaller.
trans-unit.target: 虽然理论最大长度`groupName`受的上限约束参数<xref:System.Int32>，实际限制，由可用性和配额限制强加在设置提供程序，将小得多。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The settings group name does not need to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置组名称不必是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the application settings property group.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含应用程序设置属性组的名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the application settings property group.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序设置属性组的名称。

trans-unit.source: The GroupName property value is set by the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 GroupName 属性值<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupNameAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the application settings property group.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含应用程序设置属性组的名称。</xref:System.String>
